verses.text: KE ke tauhi au, ‘e ‘Otua; He Kuo u hūfanga ki he ‘Afiona.
Kuo ke lea kia Sihova, ‘e hoku laumālie, “Ko hoku ‘Eiki koe; ‘Oku ‘ikai ha‘aku lelei ‘o mama‘o mo koe.”
Na‘a ke pehē ki he kau mā‘oni‘oni ‘oku ‘i māmani, “Ko ‘eni ia ‘a e kakai fungani, Ko ‘eku manako ‘oku kātoa ki ai.”
“Ko ‘enau mamahi ‘e fakautuutu Kuo nau fetongi ‘aki ha fo‘ou, ‘E ‘ikai te u lilingi ‘a e kava toto‘ia ‘o ‘enau ngaahi feilaulau, Pea ko honau ngaahi hingoa ‘e ‘ikai pu‘aki ‘e hoku loungutu.”
Ko hoku ‘inasi ‘i he tofi‘a, mo e ‘inasi ‘o ‘eku ipu ‘a Sihova; ‘Oku ke pukepuke hoku koloa.
Kuo falō kiate au ‘a e ngaahi afo ‘i he ngaahi potu ‘oku sai: ‘Io, ‘oku faka‘ofo‘ofa kiate au ‘a e tofi‘a ni.
Te u fakafeta‘i kia Sihova ‘a ia kuo ne fale‘i kita: Seuke, ‘i he ngaahi pō ‘oku ako mai hoku ngaahi kofuua.
Kuo u ‘ai ‘a Sihova ‘i hoku ‘ao ma‘u pē; Ko e me‘a ‘i he‘ene ‘i hoku to‘omata‘u, ko ia ai ‘e ‘ikai te u ngaue.
Ko ia kuo neka ai ‘a hoku loto, Pea vīkiviki ‘a hoku ‘elelo; Kae‘uma‘ā ‘e nofo falala foki ‘a hoku kakano.
He tala‘ehai te ke li‘aki ‘a hoku laumālie ki Lolofonua; ‘E ‘ikai te ke tuku ‘a ho‘o Pele ke sio ki he ‘auha.
Te ke faka‘ilo kiate au ‘a e hala ki he mo‘ui na; ‘Oku fe‘ao mo koe ‘a e fonu fiefia; Ko e ngaahi mālie ‘oku ‘i ho to‘omata‘u na, ‘o ta‘engata.
